name: py-pytest-xdist

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description: py.test xdist plugin for distributed testing and loop-on-failing mode

dependencies.name: py-execnet
dependencies.description:
execnet provides a share-nothing model with channel-send/receive
communication for distributing execution across many Python interpreters
across version, platform and network barriers.

dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-pytest
dependencies.description: pytest: simple powerful testing with Python.

dependencies.name: py-pytest-forked
dependencies.description: Run tests in isolated forked subprocesses.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools-scm
dependencies.description: The blessed package to manage your versions by scm tags.

dependencies.name: python-venv
dependencies.description: A Spack managed Python virtual environment

dependent_to.name: py-astropy
dependent_to.description:
The Astropy Project is a community effort to develop a single core
package for Astronomy in Python and foster interoperability between
Python astronomy packages.

dependent_to.name: py-psyclone
dependent_to.description:
Code generation system developed to support domain-specific languages
(DSLs) for finite element, finite volume and finite difference codes.
Notably, it is used in the LFRic Project from the UK Met Office, and it
also supports the GOcean (2D, finite difference) DSL.

dependent_to.name: py-pennylane
dependent_to.description: PennyLane is a Python quantum machine learning library by Xanadu Inc.

dependent_to.name: py-testinfra
dependent_to.description:
With Testinfra you can write unit tests in Python to test actual state
of your servers configured by management tools like Salt, Ansible,
Puppet, Chef and so on.
